policy.Description: Provide readonly access to Amazon MSK

actions.Description: Grants permission to describe one or more network interfaces
Grants permission to describe one or more security groups
Grants permission to describe one or more subnets
Grants permission to describe one or more VPCs
Grants permission to describe an MSK cluster
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to describe an MSK configuration revision
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to get connection details for the brokers in an MSK cluster
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to get a list of the Apache Kafka versions to which you can update an MSK cluster
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to return a list of all the operations that have been performed on the specified MSK cluster
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to list all MSK clusters in this account
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to list all revisions for an MSK configuration in this account
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to list all MSK configurations in this account
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to list all Apache Kafka versions supported by Amazon MSK
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka

actions.Description: Grants permission to list the Scram Secrets associated with an Amazon MSK cluster
actions.ServiceName: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka
